snippet: The report also challenges some of Robert E. Diamond Jr.'s assertions about the bank's relationship with regulators and raises questions about the culture and top leadership at the bank.
abstract: The report also challenges some of Robert E. Diamond Jr.'s assertions about the bank's relationship with regulators and raises questions about the culture and top leadership at the bank.

headline.main: In Report, British Officials Question Testimony of Barclays Chief
headline.print_headline: In Report, British Officials Raise Questions on Testimony of Barclays’ Chief
